newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Shell Singapore to shut 11,000-TPD gas oil unit.
newsitem.headline: Shell Singapore to shut 11,000-TPD gas oil unit.

text.p: Shell Singapore will shutdown its entire 11,000 tonne per day (TPD) thermal gas oil complex for a 21-day maintenance in early August, a company spokeswoman said on Wednesday.
"The thermal gas oil complex is due for maintenance in early August for 21 days," the spokeswoman said.
In March, Shell shut down half of its 11,000-tpd complex (82,000-barrel-per-day) for six days for de-coking, the official said.
Shell is still maintaining an around 17 percent output cut in July at its 435,000-bpd refinery due to poor margins and high stocks of middle distillate.
